command.name: scheduler
command.help: Configure the scheduler on a port

command.name: apply
command.help: Apply the new scheduler configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Apply scheduler configuration

command.name: num_groups
command.help: Set the number of scheduler groups

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<groups>
argument.help: The total number of scheduling groups for this port (1-8) (FM6000 is 1-12)

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the number of groups

command.name: group
command.help: Configure a port's scheduler group

command.name: strict
command.help: Configure the scheduler group for strict or DRR dequeue mode

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: on
argument.help: Make this scheduler group strict

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set scheduler group to strict mode

argument.name: off
argument.help: Make this scheduler group a DRR group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set scheduler group to DRR mode

command.name: traffic_class
command.help: Set the traffic class for a port's scheduler group

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<tc>
argument.help: A traffic class number (0-7) (FM6000 is 0-11), list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set scheduler group traffic class

command.name: weight
command.help: Set the DRR weight for the scheduler group

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<weight>
argument.help: Set the DRR weight. This must be larger than the port's MTU size

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set scheduler group weight

command.name: priority
command.help: Configure the scheduler group priority

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<priority>
argument.help: The scheduler group priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set scheduler group priority

command.name: shaping
command.help: Configure the egress shaper on a port

command.name: apply
command.help: Apply the new shaping configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Apply shaping configuration

command.name: num_groups
command.help: Set the number of shaping groups

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<groups>
argument.help: The total number of shaping groups for this port (1-8)

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the number of groups

command.name: group
command.help: Configure a port's scheduler group

command.name: bandwidth
command.help: Assign a bandwidth to a shaping group

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<bw>
argument.help: The bandwidth in Mb/s

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a bandwidth to a shaping group

command.name: capacity
command.help: Assign a capacity to a shaping group

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<capacity>
argument.help: The token bucket capacity in bytes. Allowed values are: 0, or a number > MTU

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a capacity to a shaping group

command.name: traffic_class
command.help: Assign a traffic class to a shaping group

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A group number, list, range, or combination thereof (zero-based)

argument.name: !<tc>
argument.help: A traffic class number (0-7), list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign traffic class to shaping group

command.name: ingress-rate-limiter
command.help: Configure the ingress rate limiter on a port

command.name: bandwidth
command.help: Assign a bandwidth to an ingress rate limiter

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: A smp number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<bw>
argument.help: The bandwidth in Mb/s

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a bandwidth to an ingress rate limiter

command.name: capacity
command.help: Assign a capacity to an ingress rate limiter

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: A smp number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<capacity>
argument.help: The token bucket capacity in bytes. Allowed values are: 0, or a number > MTU

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a capacity to an ingress rate limiter

command.name: pause-threshold
command.help: Assign a pause off threshold to an ingress rate limiter

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: A smp number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<pause-threshold>
argument.help: The token bucket pause threshold value in bytes. Allowed values are: -32768 to 32767

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a pause off threshold to an ingress rate limiter

command.name: drop-threshold
command.help: Assign a drop threshold to an ingress rate limiter

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: A smp number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<drop-threshold>
argument.help: The token bucket drop threshold value in bytes. Allowed values are: -32768 to 32767

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign a drop threshold to an ingress rate limiter

command.name: qos
command.help: Configure the qos on a port

argument.name: private_pause_off_wm
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE off watermark.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE off watermark in bytes: 0-4193280.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE off watermark.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0-1.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE off watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE off watermark.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0-11.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE off watermark in bytes: 480-10485600.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE off watermark.

argument.name: private_pause_on_wm
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE on watermark.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE on watermark in bytes: 0-4193280.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE on watermark.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0-1.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE on watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE on watermark.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Memory partition index: 0-11.

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private PAUSE on watermark in bytes: 0-10485600.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private PAUSE on watermark.

argument.name: rx_smp_hog_wm
argument.help: Set the hog receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog receive watermark in bytes: 0-1047552.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0-1).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog receive watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0-15).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog receive watermark in bytes: 0-10485600.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: rx_smp_private_wm
argument.help: Set the private receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private receive watermark in bytes: 0-1047552.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0-1).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private receive watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0-11).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private receive watermark in bytes: 0-10485600.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private receive watermark per SMP.

argument.name: tx_smp_hog_wm
argument.help: Set the hog transmit watermark per index.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<hog index>
argument.help: Hog watermark index (0).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog transmit watermark in bytes: 0-1047552.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog transmit watermark per index.

argument.name: !<hog index>
argument.help: Hog watermark index (0-3).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog transmit watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog transmit watermark per index.

argument.name: !<hog index>
argument.help: Hog watermark index (0-15).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Hog transmit watermark in bytes: 0-7863840.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the hog transmit watermark per index.

argument.name: tx_smp_private_wm
argument.help: Set the private transmit watermark per SMP.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<smp>
argument.help: Shared memory protection - SMP (0-1).

argument.name: !<integer>
argument.help: Private transmit watermark in bytes: 0-4193792.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Set the private transmit watermark per SMP.

argument.name: tx_soft_drop_on_private
argument.help: Enable or disable soft drop when the TX private watermark is surpassed.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Index of ISL priority: 0-15.

argument.name: on
argument.help: Enable soft drop when the TX private watermark is surpassed.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Soft drop when TX private watermark is surpassed: ON.

argument.name: off
argument.help: Disable soft drop when the TX private watermark is surpassed.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Soft drop when TX private watermark is surpassed: OFF.

argument.name: tx_soft_drop_on_rxmp_free
argument.help: Enable or disable soft drop when the TX passes half of the free RXMP usage.

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof.

argument.name: !<index>
argument.help: Index of ISL priority: 0-15.

argument.name: on
argument.help: Enable soft drop when the TX passes half of the free RXMP usage.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Soft drop when TX passes half of the free RXMP usage: ON.

argument.name: off
argument.help: Disable soft drop when the TX passes half of the free RXMP usage.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Soft drop when TX passes half of the free RXMP usage: OFF.

command.name: scheduler
command.help: Show port scheduler configuration

argument.name: active
argument.help: Show the current port scheduler configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show the current port scheduler configuration

argument.name: new
argument.help: Show the new port scheduler configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show the new port scheduler configuration

command.name: shaping
command.help: Show port shaping configuration

argument.name: active
argument.help: Show the current port shaping configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show the current port shaping configuration

argument.name: new
argument.help: Show the new port shaping configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show the new port shaping configuration

command.name: ingress-rate-limiter
command.help: Show ingress port rate limiter configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show ingress port rate limiter configuration

command.name: qos
command.help: Show port qos configuration

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: A port number, list, range, or combination thereof

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Show the current port qos configuration
